title: IBACnetEventConsumer (Interface)
text:
INTERFACE PUBLIC IBACnetEventConsumer
Interface which has to be implemented by a FB, which can be registered using
BACnetServer.RegisterHook
or
BACnetServer.RegisterCallback
. This
Interface gets called whenever the specified event (by the calls of
BACnetServer.RegisterHook
or
BACnetServer.RegisterCallback
) occurs.
Methods:
BACnetEventCallback
Structure:
BACnetEventCallback (Method)
